name: DirectMail
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: direct mail
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You've received marketing that ties in with Alexa? Great! Simply enter your "Campaign PIN" found on your marketing material, 
 followed by your personal "Activation Code" to get started. Follow the prompts to be entered into the event, get your coupon, 
 get your trade value, etc!
